KeyMap.Name: 110: DRU
KeyMap.Description: CLASS TEMPLATE is virtualized at the CHARACTER level

KeyMap.Name: 999: Mapped Key Graveyard
KeyMap.Description: what is dead may never die

MappedKey.Name: 000: - HOTKEYS-Combat: Load Combat
MappedKey.Description:
combat initiation
Assist the ISB driver (or EQ MA) depending on ATG membership Assist Reset (resets things back to 1 after a mob dies)
EQ automagically stops attacking when the target dies, but ISB has no way to know this. we reset attack off state to off, avoiding a confusion on the next fight
reset MeleeAttack back to 1, move things like offensive stuff and burns back to 1

MappedKey.Name: 000: - HOTKEYS-Control: Show Menus
MappedKey.Description: a simple toggle to turn menus on and off with a single keypress

MappedKeyAction.MappedKeyString: Control: Load My Group 1 Leader ATGs

MappedKey.Name: 100: Slot1 Control: VFX - dxNothing-1mon
MappedKey.Description: dxNothing viewers for 1-monitor layout

MappedKey.Name: 100: Slot1 Control: VFX - dxNothing-2mon
MappedKey.Description: dxNothing viewers for 2-monitor layout

MappedKey.Name: 199: General-Movement: Follow: Group1
MappedKey.Description:
we cannot follow while sitting, so we must /stand
using an EQ social that does /stand will make step1 here redundant

MappedKey.Name: Clicky: FeatherHorn-v3
MappedKey.Description:
clunky mechanism to achieve a Feather and Horn rotation on the characters that have them
ToDo: figure out how to more gracefully recover from a misfire. ISB assumes success, but it's possible that the keystroke did nothing because the EQ character was stunned or casting a spell, and didn't actually click the item.
clicking manually through VFX is possible, but probably not the best way

MappedKeyAction.Text: FEATHERHORN-V4 - NOT ADVANCING TO NEXT STEP

MappedKey.Description: Vritualizes Control: GrpReset during character set startup

MappedKey.Description: Virtualize and execute Control: GrpReset

MappedKey.Name: Control: GrpReset-MPC
MappedKey.Description: Vritualizes Control: GrpReset during character set startup

MappedKey.Name: Control: GrpReset-MPC-On
MappedKey.Description: Virtualize and execute Control: GrpReset

MappedKey.Name: Control: Invite - Accept
MappedKey.Description: virtualized key to accept a group invite with a Variable Keystroke

MappedKey.Name: Control: Invite - Decline
MappedKey.Description: virtualized key to decline a group invite with a Variable Keystroke

MappedKey.Name: Control: Invite - Send
MappedKey.Description: virtualized key to send a group invite with a Variable Keystroke

MappedKey.Name: Control: Set Me as MA
MappedKey.Description:
2-step keystring action that sets this character as the group main assist
step 1 populates the clipboard with a command grouproles set charname 2
step 2 pastes the string into EQ with the Paste from Clipboard mapped key / + <step 1 string>

MappedKey.Name: Control: Set Me as MT
MappedKey.Description:
2-step keystring action that sets this character as the group main tank
step 1 populates the clipboard with a command grouproles set charname 1
step 2 pastes the string into EQ with the Paste from Clipboard mapped key / + <step 1 string>

MappedKey.Name: Control: Setup-1_sav
MappedKey.Description:
this is typically executed via menu button
Flush ATGs and Clear all VFX assign leader ATG send group invites via Variable Keystroke Action accept invites via Variable Keystroke Action, join member ATGs reject invites via Variable Keystroke if slot is unwanted, leave ATGs activate hotkeys for CurrentBoxes ATG

MappedKey.Name: Control: Setup-1-Leader
MappedKey.Description:
Called in Step 2 of the Control: Setup-1 mapped key
Loads group members into the appropriate Leader or Member ATGs

Control: Load My Group 1 Member ATGs

Control: Load My Group 1 Member ATGs

MappedKey.Name: Control: Setup-1-SAVE
MappedKey.Description:
this is typically executed via menu button
Note: to disable a character, disable the relevant step and re-export
Flush ATGs and Clear all VFX assign leader ATG send invites via Variable Keystroke Action accept invites via Variable Keystroke Action, join member ATGs reject invites via Variable Keystroke if slot is unwanted recreate VFX sources and viewers for CurrenBoxes ATG activate hotkeys for CurrentBoxes ATG
